analysis.description:
SecurityController.checkTransfer (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#493-545) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- ledger.transferDryRun(_from,_to,_value,lockoutTime) == _value

SecurityLedger.multiMint has external calls inside a loop:
	- controller.ledgerTransfer(0,addr,value) (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#703-704)

Reentrancy in SecurityLedger.mint (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#669-682):
	External calls:
	- controller.ledgerTransfer(0,addr,value) (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#680-681)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#681-682)

SecurityController.isTransferAuthorized (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#462-475) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- expiry > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#474-475)

SecurityController.setTransferAuthorized (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#375-397) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(expiry <= (block.timestamp + 2592000)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#390-393)
	- require(bool)(expiry > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#389-390)

SecurityController.checkTransfer (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#493-545) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- fromIsAffiliate || toIsAffiliate (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#518-520)
	- ledger.transferDryRun(_from,_to,_value,lockoutTime) == _value (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#537-544)

SecurityLedger.mint (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#669-682) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- time == 0 (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#675-678)

SecurityLedger.multiMint (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#682-705) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- time == 0 (/unique_chucks/28/0xaec587f5ca622e7029d3b278e5a42a57a814d85e.sol#691-694)
